00033 RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::
00034 GuiFrameListener(RenderWindow* win, Camera* cam, CEGUI::Renderer* renderer)
00035                                :ExampleFrameListener(win, cam, true, true){
00036   mGUIRenderer=renderer;
00037   mShutdownRequested=false;
00038 
00039   LOGI("Constructing GuiFrameListener");
00040   mEventProcessor->addMouseMotionListener(this);
00041   mEventProcessor->addMouseListener(this);
00042   mEventProcessor->addKeyListener(this);
00043 
00044   mMoveScale = 1.1f;
00045 }
00046 
00050 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::requestShutdown(void){
00051   LOGI("requestShutdown called");
00052   mShutdownRequested = true;
00053 }
00054 
00062 bool RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt){
00063   moveCamera();
00064 
00065   GameEngine::getSingleton().frameStarted(evt);
00066 
00067   GuiManager::getSingleton().guiFade();
00068 
00069   if (!GameEngine::getSingleton().running())
00070     mShutdownRequested=true;
00071 
00072   //  ExampleFrameListener::frameStarted( evt);
00073 
00074   return true;
00075 }
00076 
00085 bool RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::frameEnded(const FrameEvent& evt){
00086   GameEngine::getSingleton().frameEnded(evt);
00087   GuiManager::getSingleton().showFPS();
00088   
00089   if (mShutdownRequested)
00090     return false;
00091   else
00092     return ExampleFrameListener::frameEnded(evt);
00093 }
00094 
00100 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::mouseMoved (MouseEvent *e){
00101   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectMouseMove(
00102                  e->getRelX() * mGUIRenderer->getWidth(), 
00103                  e->getRelY() * mGUIRenderer->getHeight());
00104   e->consume();
00105 }
00106 
00112 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::mouseDragged(MouseEvent *e){ 
00113   mouseMoved(e);
00114 }
00115 
00121 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::mousePressed(MouseEvent *e){
00122   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectMouseButtonDown(
00123                  GameEngine::getSingleton().
00124                  convertOgreButtonToCegui(e->getButtonID()));
00125 
00126   e->consume();
00127 }
00128 
00134 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::mouseReleased(MouseEvent *e){
00135   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectMouseButtonUp(
00136                  GameEngine::getSingleton().
00137                  convertOgreButtonToCegui(e->getButtonID()));
00138   e->consume();
00139 }
00140 
00146 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::keyPressed(KeyEvent* e){
00147   if(e->getKey() == KC_ESCAPE){
00148     mShutdownRequested = true;
00149     e->consume();
00150     return;
00151   }
00152   /* Move camera forward by keypress. */
00153   if (e->getKey() == KC_UP ||e->getKey() == KC_Z ){
00154     mTranslateVector.z = -mMoveScale;
00155   }
00156   /* Move camera backward by keypress. */
00157   if (mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_DOWN) || mInputDevice->isKeyDown(KC_S)){
00158     mTranslateVector.z = mMoveScale;
00159   }
00160 
00161  
00162   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectKeyDown(e->getKey());
00163   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectChar(e->getKeyChar());
00164   e->consume();
00165 }
00166 
00172 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::keyReleased(KeyEvent* e){
00173     mTranslateVector.z = 0.0f;
00174 
00175 
00176   CEGUI::System::getSingleton().injectKeyUp(e->getKey());
00177   e->consume();
00178 }
00179 
00185 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::keyClicked(KeyEvent* e){
00186   // Do nothing
00187   e->consume();
00188 }
00189 
00195 void RainbruRPG::Events::GuiFrameListener::setCamera(Camera*cam){
00196   mCamera=cam;
00197 }
